title: how to report boosting?
body:
added player off of team recruitment and first thing he says is only plays for rp or skins
hes a whole tier above the account i was playing on. is this classified as boosting and can he be reported for it?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This sounds to me like it could be classified as boosting, however that's for the Player Behaviour team to decide.

If you wish to report this summoner, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and they will forward the details onto the correct team.
